name: Dragonborn
description: Dragonborn are the children of dragons, born with a connection to the dragon god. They are known for their wisdom, strength, and compassion.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to your Dragon Ancestor Damage Type.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Draconic Flight
traits.description: When you reach 5th level you can channel magic to give yourself temporary flight. You sprout spectral wings on your back that last for 10 minutes or until you retract your wings (no action required) or have incapacitated condition. During that time you have a Fly Speed equal to your Speed. You cannot use this again until you finish a long rest.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one attack with an exhalation of magical energy in a 15-foot cone or a 50-foot line (choose each time). Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Constitution modifier and Proficiency Bonus). On a failed save, a creature takes 1d10 damage of the type determined by your Draconic Ancestry. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage. This damage increases by 1d10 at character levels 5 (2d10), 11 (5d10), and 17 (4d10). You can use this Breath Weapon a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus and regain all expended uses after a Long Rest.
